column4: I have an https site that warns users that the site is insecure because the certificate is invalid - do I need to purchase an ssl certificate or should I be able to generate my own
if you generate your own your users will still get a warning saying that the certificate cannot be validated (or what it says when an issuer is unknown)
so I have to buy one to get rid of that warning.  Will the basic model at godaddyssl.com do the trick?
